message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SE, cs.SI

The paper discusses a new tool for assessing the risk associated with security events produced by sensors monitoring attacks exploiting residual vulnerabilities. This falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The Bayesian network-based extension to topological attack graphs is a machine learning approach, which could also be categorized under artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the evaluation of the model on realistic topologies, which falls under software engineering (cs.SE) and systems and control (cs.SI).
